textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Parisian-trained fashion designer Ben Taverniti lends his couture sensibility to Hudson jeans, fusing his zest for life with the brand’s figure-flattering, fashion-forward silhouettes. Conceived in California but based in London, the cheeky Hudson denim label is for those daring enough to bare their souls, take chances, and create their own destinies. At times naughty and cheeky, it’s all about being comfortable in one’s own skin (while clad in a pair of sexy, perfectly fitting jeans).
